q1: Germany had a poor world cup
a1: Nah. Even though they didn't win I say they did really well
a2: Yes, but they still did not make it past the group stage this year.
q3: What other countries were in their group?
a3: Mexico, Sweden, and South Korea were in the group.
q4: Can germany win the world cup in 2022?
a4: I think they have a very good chance of winning despite their 2018 performance.
q5: Do you think they need to get new fresh younger players in the first team?
a5: Yes, it's always good to keep the team roster fresher while keeping team cohesion.
